Package JavaApi.Samplers.NumberSamplers.NaturalNumberSamplers

Interface Summary
INaturalNumberSampler The most basic interface for a Natural Number Sampler
IStdNaturalNumberSampler An extension to the most basic Natural Number Sampler which adds the ability to set both min and max values that might be returned by this sampler
 

Class Summary
ConstantNumberSampler A simple constant Natural Number Sampler which always returns the value that was set, Or the default value of 1.
CyclicCounterNumberSampler Implements a counter number sampler which resets its value to the minimal value once it reaches the max value
NumberSamplerNoRep A standard abstract implementation of the INaturalNumberSampler interface which uses the Java standard implementation of random numbers but holds an internal state which enables it to return numbers without repetitions
NumberSamplerNoRepFactory Factory class for creating NumberSamplers without repetitions
NumberSamplerNoRepRemImpl A standard implementation of the INaturalNumberSampler interface which uses the Java standard implementation of random numbers but holds an internal state which enables it to return numbers without repetitions
NumberSamplerNoRepRemSwapImpl A standard implementation of the INaturalNumberSampler interface which uses the Java standard implementation of random numbers but holds an internal state which enables it to return numbers without repetitions
NumberSamplerNoRepUsedImpl A standard implementation of the INaturalNumberSampler interface which uses the Java standard implementation of random numbers but holds an internal state which enables it to return numbers without repetitions
StdNaturalNumberSampler A standard implementation of the INaturalNumberSampler interface which uses the Java standard implementation of random numbers generation (acting as a simple wrapper which exposes the needed interface)
 

Enum Summary
NoRepetitionMode Simple enum for defining the method for avoiding repetitions
